basic_node.title: Low number density of beams irradiated on object
basic_node.description: Number of beams irradiated on an object being too low with respect to further receiving and processing steps.
basic_node.references: [re2, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0921889015302633] [re2, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8721124/] [pp3, https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/19/6/1474] [pp3, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0921889015302633] [pp3, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, More/less beams hitting an object in case of motion scan effect compared to static measurements. Number of additional or less beams hitting the object is then dependent on sensor resolution. Wrong cardinalities of clustered points in case of too few beams hitting the object is the result.] [pp10, https://www.isprs.org/PROCEEDINGS/XXXIV/3-W13/papers/Smith_ALSDD2003.pdf]
